business.headline: What to expect from stock market this week? 4 key things investors should knowMultiple factors could determine the mood on Dalal Street. From April 12 to 19, investors will be watching crucial Q4 earnings, economic data releases in India, the US, and China.
Investor visits Mumbai slum, uncovers truth about 'Make in India'Veteran investor Shankar Sharma recently shared a personal experience that raised fresh questions about India's manufacturing reality.

'Shift to UAE': Kotak AMC MD Nilesh Shah flags tax loophole exploited by NRIsNilesh Shah has warned that high-net-worth individuals could exploit tax treaties with some countries to avoid India's capital gains tax.

RBI may pay record Rs 2.5 lakh crore dividend to centre in FY25The RBI is likely to announce the exact dividend amount in late May. Last year, the payout surprised many as it was double what most had expected.

Ambedkar Jayanti 2025: Is the stock market closed today?Over the past few months, benchmark indices Sensex and Nifty have seen large ups and downs, with global news, especially from the United States, playing a major role in the market's movement.

Tariff war may benefit India despite short-term shocks: Mercedes-Benz India CEOMercedes-Benz India CEO Santosh Iyer stated that India may benefit from the ongoing global tariff war in the long term despite short-term challenges. He highlights the potential for increased trade and reduced barriers as a positive outcome for India.

Why is Apple in a race against time to fly iPhones back to the US?Apple's long-term goal is to reduce its dependence on Chinese factories and shift more production to other countries, with India playing a big part in that plan.  However, it relies heavily on a network of suppliers and trained workers that only exists at the required scale in parts of Asia.

RBI launches WhatsApp Channel: Here's how to access it via QR codeThe RBI said that the goal of the WhatsApp channel is to provide verified and timely information about banking, digital safety, and other important topics directly to users.

Pentagon cuts $5.1 billion contracts with Accenture, Deloitte: Wasteful spendingThe contracts appeared to be wide-ranging cuts to consulting services for the Navy, the Air Force, the Defense Advanced Research Projects Agency (DARPA) and the Defense Health Agency.

Wall Street bounces back after wild week fueled by tariff warAll three major US indexes ended the session sharply higher after assurances from Boston Federal Reserve President Susan Collins that the Fed is prepared to keep financial markets functioning should the need arise.

India pushing for trade deals with US, EU with high urgency: JaishankarOn Wednesday, Trump announced a 90-day pause on his sweeping tariffs on all countries, except China as countries around the world wilted under the impact of the seismic action.

How Trump tariffs could make iPhones, cars, and clothes costlier in the USTrump's latest plan includes a massive 145% tax on goods coming from China. Experts say this could end the long run of cheap, imported goods that Americans have enjoyed for decades.

entertainment.headline: HIT 3 Trailer: Nani's Arjun Sarkaar restores faith in humanity in gritty thrillerThe much-awaited trailer of HIT 3 is out. Starring Nani as the fierce cop Arjun Sarkaar, the action-thriller will release in theatres on May 1.

Big B asks fans how to grow his X followers, internet responds with hilarious ideasAmitabh Bachchan shared a post on X asking fans how he could grow his follower count. The internet responded with hilarious suggestions, including posting a selfie with actor Rekha, among others.

Ibrahim Ali Khan's red jacket look in Swiss pics screams Saif's Ta Ra Rum Pum vibesIbrahim Ali Khan once again gave his fans the like-father-like-son moment when he shared new photos of himself wearing a red jacket during his Switzerland trip.

Bold and thought-provoking: Kareena confirms Daayra with Meghna Gulzar, PrithvirajActors Kareena Kapoor and Prithviraj Sukumaran are set to share the screen space for the first time in Meghna Gulzar's crime drama, 'Daayra.'

More of Hrithik, Saba, and little Malti in Priyanka's April photo-dump 'so far'Actor Priyanka Chopra on Monday gave a glimpse into her 'April so far'. She shared a new photo from her outing with Krrish co-star Hrithik Roshan and his partner, Saba Azad.

End hate: Apoorva Mukhija stands by friend Rida Tharana over black magic commentApoorva Mukhija has spoken out following criticism directed at Rida Tharana over her remarks on black magic. She calls for an end to spreading negativity.

Sunita Ahuja's 'zip it' reaction to paparazzi asking about Govinda. WatchGovinda and his wife, Sunita Ahuja, faced divorce rumours earlier this year. Now, her reaction to paps asking about her husband's absence from an event has gone viral in a new video.

Samantha says same role, same days, but paid 'dramatically different' than menActor Samantha opened up about the significant pay gap between her and her male counterparts in the Telugu film industry. She advocated for equal pay for equal work.

Jaat box office Day 4: Sunny Deol's film misses Rs 50 crore mark in 1st weekend Sunny Deol's 'Jaat' collected around Rs 40 crore nett in India after its extended opening weekend. The film showed impressive growth on its first Sunday, which is a good sign for its future run domestically.

Pawan Kalyan's wife Anna offers hair at Tirumala after son survives fire accidentActor-politician Pawan Kalyan's wife Anna Lezhneva tonsured her head after their son, Mark Shankar, survived the fire accident at his school in Singapore. Anna vowed her hair to Lord Venkateshwara at the Tirumala Tirupati temple.

Good Bad Ugly box office Day 4: Ajith's film to top Dragon soon, nears Rs 100 croreAjith's 'Good Bad Ugly' is moving at a decent pace. While it is yet to surpass the benchmark of Rs 100 crore domestically, the film has already managed to cross that mark worldwide.

The Last of Us 2 Episode 1 review: Pedro Pascal show hits the sweet spotReleased-Mon Apr 14, 2025The pilot episode of HBO's highly-anticipated The Last of Us Season 2 is here, and it is safe to say that the audiences are in for an exhilarating ride. Once again. Read our complete take on the first episode here.

Babil Khan reacts to trolling over old apology video: Some memes hurt meActor Babil Khan broke his silence on the trolling that he was subjected to after hi repeated apologies for mistakenly photobombing a woman at an event.
I do feel bad: Taarak Mehta creator Asit Modi breaks silence on controversies'Taarak Mehta Ka Ooltah Chashmah' creator Asit Modi responded to allegations raised by former actors of the show.

Kylie Jenner, Timothee Chalamet kiss and cuddle at Coachella 2025. WatchKylie Jenner and Timothee Chalamet were clicked together on the second day of Coachella on April 12. The two indulged in PDA at the event.

Mother-to-be Gauahar Khan dazzles on ramp, flaunts baby bump. WatchGauhara Khan, who is expecting her second child with husband Zaid Darbar, stole the attention with her stunning ramp walk. The actor flaunted her baby bump in a viral video.

Why Adolescence actor Owen Cooper hasn't watched his hit Netflix showActor Owen Cooper recently reacted to the screening of the Netflix series Adolescence in schools. The actor called it his 'worst nightmare'

Actor Mouni Roy breaks silence on plastic surgery rumours and brutal trollingActor Mouni Roy has been trolled after reports of her getting plastic surgery surfaced. She broke her silence on the relentless trolling at a recent event.

Hrithik Roshan's US event organisers reject mismanagement claims after complaintsHrithik Roshan's fans were upset after they were denied photos and autographs at the actor's US event. However, the organisers have now reacted to the claims going viral.

general news.headline: How India foiled Mehul Choksi's plan to flee to SwitzerlandMehul Choksi, who fled India in 2018 before his involvement in PNB scam case came to light, was arrested by Belgium authorities at India's request.

Votebank ka virus: PM slams Congress for insulting Ambedkar, opposing Waqf ActUpping the ante on Ambedkar Jayanti, PM Modi claimed that Congress never used the Constitution to benefit anyone, including the Muslims, Scheduled Castes, Scheduled Tribes, and Other Backward Classes.

Trump's new immigration rules bring more bad news for IndiansThe EB-5 Unreserved category for Indian applicants has retrogressed by over six months - from November 1, 2019, to May 1, 2019 - narrowing the eligibility window and significantly delaying the path to US permanent residency.

Will blow up his car: Actor Salman Khan gets another death threat, case filedThe fresh threat to Salman Khan comes almost exactly a year after multiple rounds were fired outside his Bandra home. Over the last few years, the Bollywood actor has received multiple threats from the Lawrence Bishnoi gang.

Not just the mother's battle: How diabetes can cross the wombNeonatal diabetes is a rare type of diabetes that appears in newborns, usually before six months of age. Genetic testing helps doctors know which type a baby has and how to treat it effectively.

Mehul Choksi arrested from Belgium hospital on India's request for extraditionThe arrest, made at the request of Indian agencies including the Central Bureau of Investigation (CBI) and the Enforcement Directorate (ED), follows non-bailable warrants issued against him by Mumbai courts.

UP cop mistakes judge for thief, searches her home in bizarre court order mix-upThe incident unfolded when Sub-Inspector Banwarilal, tasked with executing a proclamation order under Section 82 of the Criminal Procedure Code (CrPC), began searching for Chief Judicial Magistrate Nagma Khan - who had in fact issued the proclamation against the actual accused, Rajkumar alias Pappu.

Caught on CCTV: Karnataka rape accused seen kidnapping 5-year-old from parkThe chilling CCTV footage captured the moment a man abducted a five-year-old girl in Hubballi, Karnataka, ultimately leading to her murder. The accused was later killed in an encounter with the police.
Gonna sing in space: Katy Perry shows her call sign, capsule, seat for spaceflightThe American pop singer shared a video on her Instagram giving a tour of her spaceship capsule.

Choksi's wallet is full, he will do what Vijay Mallya did, warns whistleblowerIn what could provide a boost to India's fight against fugitive economic offenders, diamond trader Mehul Choksi has been arrested in Belgium. However, getting Choksi extradited could be a tough task, says PNB scam whistleblower Hariprasad SV. He says Choksi has the money to hire the best lawyers in Europe and frustrate India's efforts, like former liquor baron Vijay Mallya has.

Trump's 'nobody gets off the hook' warning triggers fresh tariff fearsDonald Trump said that his administration is preparing a national security investigation focused specifically on semiconductors and the entire electronics supply chain, much of which depends heavily on Chinese manufacturing.

Anna vowed her hair to Lord Venkateshwara at the Tirumala Tirupati temple.

Tamil Nadu educationists demand Governor RN Ravi's removal over 'Jai Shri Ram' rowA body of Tamil Nadu educationists has written to President Droupadi Murmu, demanding the removal of Governor RN Ravi for violating constitutional secularism by asking college students to chant "Jai Shri Ram" during a public event.

'Shift to UAE': Kotak AMC MD Nilesh Shah flags tax loophole exploited by NRIsNilesh Shah has warned that high-net-worth individuals could exploit tax treaties with some countries to avoid India's capital gains tax.

India flying and how: Air passenger traffic set for  80% jump in 5 yearsThe magnitude of the projected expansion indicates how infrastructure for airports, runways and corridors linking big and small cities will need to keep pace

Porter agent calls customer lazy for tower-to-tower delivery, video sparks debateThe Porter delivery man, who documented the process in the video, turned the camera toward tower 17, from where he had to collect the order, and then pointed at tower 19 in the same apartment complex, where it needed to be delivered.

Who is Nikita Casap? US teen charged with parents' murder, plotting to kill TrumpAuthorities said that Nikita Casap, 17, killed his parents in February in a plan to finance the assassination of US President Donald Trump and overthrow his government.

Tech layoffs 2025: Google, Microsoft and more continue to fire employeesTech layoffs are continuing in 2025, with major companies like Google and Microsoft trimming their workforce. These companies are reportedly laying off more employees as part of efforts to cut costs and improve team efficiency.

IndiGo shifts all Delhi Terminal2 flights to T1 and T3 starting April 15Due to maintenance at Delhi Airport's Terminal 2, all IndiGo flights will operate from Terminal 1 starting April 15. Check updated terminal details and travel advisories.

Why Farah Khan's unconventional health routine is turning headsFarah Khan's fitness routine included hydro workouts, gym sessions, a specific and controlled diet as well as the no-cost physical activity - stair climbing.

Tense calm in Murshidabad after anti-Waqf clashes; Trinamool, BJP play blame gameOn Sunday, some miscreants tried to carry out attacks in a few places, according to the border forces. But, they were soon overpowered by the BSF. While the situation remained under control, political parties continued to trade barbs over who was responsible for the unrest.

Ex-armyman who killed wife arrested 20 years after jumping paroleAnil Kumar Tiwari, a native of Sidhi in Madhya Pradesh, had killed his wife in May 1989. He was granted a two-week parole in 2005 by the Delhi High Court, but he jumped parole and absconded.

Big B asks fans how to grow his X followers, internet responds with hilarious ideasAmitabh Bachchan shared a post on X asking fans how he could grow his follower count. The internet responded with hilarious suggestions, including posting a selfie with actor Rekha, among others.

sports.headline: Dhoni vs Rishabh in focus as CSK look to arrest freefall vs LucknowIPL 2025, LSG vs CSK match preview: Chennai Super Kings are in a freefall, losing six games in a row this season. Can they arrest their collapse against Rishabh Pant's Lucknow, who have sizzled with their in-form players?

Axar Patel fined Rs 12 lakh, 6th captain penalised for slow over-rateIPL 2025: Axar Patel became the sixth captain to be fined Rs 12 lakh for over-rate offence. The Delhi Capitals suffered their first defeat of the season, falling short of a 206-run target by 13 runs in New Delhi on Sunday.

Watch: Virat Kohli gets pranked by RCB teammates after win vs RRRoyal Challengers Bengaluru players pulled off a hilarious prank on Virat Kohli after their win against  Rajasthan Royals. Tim David stole Virat's bat, which saw hilarious reactions from the legendary batter.

About time RCB started winning at home: Padikkal jokes after 4th away winRoyal Challengers Bengaluru beat Rajasthan Royals 9 wickets in Jaipur on Sunday. This was RCB's 4th away win in the IPL in as many games. After the match, batter Devdutt Padikkal joked that it was about time RCB started to win at home.

RCB not worried about their poor home form in IPL 2025: Mo BobatRoyal Challengers Bengaluru's director of cricket, Mo Bobat, said that he was not worried about the team's home vs away record in the IPL 2025. This season, RCB have done well while visiting other venues, but have floundered at home.

I had the confidence: Karun Nair after making sizzling IPL comebackKarun Nair put in an incredible show with the bat in his comeback to the Indian Premier League. Nair was the lone warrior for Delhi Capitals but was not able to take them home. Speaking after the match, Karun Nair said that he had the confidence that he would do well if given a chance this season.

Karn Sharma relishes MI return after match-winning performance vs DCIPL 2025: Mumbai Indians spinner Karna Sharma said that he was relishing his return to the Mumbai Indians. Sharma returned to the MI side and picked up 3 wickets in his very first match of the tournament vs Delhi Capitals.

Karn trumps Karun: Spinner points out game-changing moment in DC vs MIMumbai Indians' Karn Sharma ruined Karun Nair's IPL comeback on Sunday, April 13. Karn picked up 3 wickets in a nervy game which handed Mumbai their second win of the season.

Karun Nair logs back into IPL, seamlessly syncs with new-age T20 gameIPL 2025, DC vs MI: After waiting for three long years, Karun Nair grabbed the opportunity with both hands after scoring 89 runs off 40 balls for the Delhi Capitals against Mumbai Indians in Sunday's clash at the Arun Jaitley Stadium.

Didn't see retiring out decision negatively, it was done for the team: Tilak VarmaMumbai Indians' (MI) batter Tilak Varma opened up about his team's decision to retire him out vs Lucknow Super Giants and said that he never took it negatively and understood that it was done for the team's cause.

Nair scored 89 (40) against Mumbai Indians (MI) on his IPL comeback after three years.

Nair scored 89 (40) against Mumbai Indians (MI) on his IPL comeback after three years.

Karun Nair took us by surprise: Hardik admits DC batter put pressure on MIIPL 2025, DC vs MI: Hardik Pandya said that Karun Nair made life difficult for the Mumbai Indians bowlers in Sunday's clash at the Arun Jaitley Stadium. Nair made 89 off 40 before Mitchell Santner dismissed him.

Watch: Axar Patel's hilarious take on DC's 12-run loss vs MI: 'Mumbai ke pass'Delhi Capitals' (DC) captain Axar Patel gave a hilarious answer to Murali Kartik's question following his team's 12-run loss against Mumbai Indians (MI) at Arun Jaitley Stadium in New Delhi.

RR had no option but to release players: Batting coach Vikram RathoreIPL 2025, RR vs RCB: Rajasthan Royals batting coach Viram Rathore explained how it was only natural for the side to let players go ahead of the 2025 mega auction due to team management, and backed the side's current squad to stage a turnaround this season.

Rohit Sharma teases Karun Nair after DC star's heated faceoff vs BumrahIPL 2025: Karun Nair's fiery fifty came with flair and fire as he collided with Jasprit Bumrah during a high-voltage DC vs MI clash, triggering tense exchanges and a classic Rohit Sharma smirk.

Karun Nair's 89 in vain as Mumbai end Delhi's dream runDC vs MI, IPL 2025: Karun Nair scored 89 runs off 40 balls, but his knock went in vain as the Delhi Capitals lost to the Mumbai Indians by 12 runs on Sunday at the Arun Jaitley Stadium in Delhi.

Watch: Kohli takes evasive action as fan comes running towards him in JaipurRoyal Challengers Bengaluru (RCB) star Virat Kohli was seen taking evasive action as a fan came running towards him after their win over Rajasthan Royals (RR) in Match 29 of the Indian Premier League 2025 (IPL 2025).

DC vs MI: Karun Nair smashes Jasprit Bumrah, hits IPL fifty after 7 yearsIPL 2025: Karun Nair marked his IPL comeback with a blistering fifty against MI, showing glimpses of his domestic dominance and silencing critics with a sensational assault on Jasprit Bumrah and Mumbai's pace attack.

RR can win all their remaining matches: Batting coach after RCB lossIPL 2025: Despite a tough start to IPL 2025, Rajasthan Royals batting coach Vikram Rathore believes the squad has the firepower to bounce back and keep their playoff hopes alive by winning their remaining fixtures. RR suffered their fourth loss of the season after going down by 9 wickets to RCB.

RR suffered their fourth loss of the season after going down by 9 wickets to RCB.

Stephen Fleming on CSK's six-hitting woes: Cricket isn't a baseball competitionIPL 2025, LSG vs CSK: In the pre-match press conference, Chennai Super Kings' head coach Stephen Fleming said that cricket isn't a baseball competition and there is still an importance of craft and traditional stroke-making.

IPL 2025: Why umpires checked the bat size of Hardik Pandya?The umpires were seen checking the bat size of Mumbai Indians captain Hardik Pandya during Match 29 of the Indian Premier League 2025 (IPL 2025) against Delhi Capitals (DC).

Sourav Ganguly re-appointed as ICC men's cricket committee chairpersonICC announced the reappointment of Sourav Ganguly as Men's Cricket Committee chair, reinforcing their trust in his leadership as he continues to guide the global development and regulation of the sport. The rest of the panel include the likes of VVS Laxman and even Temba Bavuma.

ICC to support displaced Afghanistan women cricketers, Jay Shah reveals detailsThe ICC has partnered with the BCCI, CA, and ECB to support displaced Afghanistan women cricketers, providing them with financial assistance, advanced coaching, and mentorship.

Churchill Brothers threaten to boycott Super Cup amidst I-League title rowChurchill Brothers remain firm on their demand for I-League recognition, putting their Super Cup participation in doubt as they await AIFF's final verdict amid the ongoing title dispute with Inter Kashi.

Former LSU star Kyren Lacy found dead in Houston at 24Former LSU wide receiver Kyren Lacy was found dead early Sunday morning, April 13, in a Houston hotel room, just hours before he was scheduled to appear before a grand jury. He was 24.

MS Dhoni not a soothsayer, he doesn't have magic wand to revive CSK: FlemingIPL 2025, LSG vs CSK: Speaking to the press on the eve of Chennai's clash in Lucknow, head coach Stephen Fleming said MS Dhoni cannot magically turn around the team's fortunes, adding that it requires a collective effort to recover from their slump. CSK have lost five of their first six matches, including the one that marked Dhoni's return to captaincy.

Rohit Sharma's poor run continues, fails after explosive start vs Delhi CapitalsIndia and Mumbai Indians (MI) opening batter Rohit Sharma continued his poor form in the Indian Premier League 2025 (IPL 2025) as he got dismissed for 18 (12) against Delhi Capitals (DC) in Match 29.

RCB's Phil Salt happy to 'have a wood' on Jofra Archer after RR winIPL 2025: Phil Salt was all smiles after winning his mini-duel with England teammate Jofra Archer, playing a key role in RCB's fourth straight away win. His familiarity with Archer proved vital in tackling the early pressure.

Faf du Plessis shares injury update after missing DC vs MI clash in DelhiDelhi Capitals (DC) opening batter Faf du Plessis has been ruled out of Match 29 of the Indian Premier League 2025 (IPL 2025) due to an injury. Du Plessis has hoped to get fit within a week after picking up an injury in the last game against Royal Challengers Bengaluru (RCB).

Carlos Alcaraz first Spaniard since Nadal to win Monte Carlo MastersCarlos Alcaraz beat Italy's Lorenzo Musetti 3-6, 6-1, 6-0 in the final on Sunday to become the first Spanish player since the legendary Rafael Nadal to win the Monte Carlo Masters.

Carlos Alcaraz finds peak form before French Open, wins Monte Carlo Masters crownAfter suffering a shock second-round exit at Miami Open last month, Carlos Alcaraz won the Masters 1000 title in Monte Carlo on clay. The 21-year-old will rise to No. 2 in men's singles tennis rankings, which will be updated on Monday, April 14.

education.headline: The role of data analytics in modern advertising educationThis transformation also exercises a significant impact on the realm of 'advertising education.'

NCERT deletes Azad Pak, adds China's aggression reference in Class 12 textbookThe NCERT has made final changes to its Class 12 Political Science textbook syllabus for the upcoming academic year, including a revision in reference to India's border situation with China, Azad Pakistan, Article 370 and more.

NEET row: Bihar cops find 6 post-dated cheques 'issued for question paper brokers'Six post-dated cheques which were suspected to have been issued in favour of mafia demanding over Rs 30 lakh from each candidate seeking alleged leaked question paper ahead of NEET held last month were recovered by Bihar Police.

Forest fires surge tenfold from 2004 to 2017: Causes, impact and preventionAmidst a relentless surge, intense forest fires are now multiplying tenfold, casting a menacing shadow over our flora and fauna. Year by year, their fiery grip tightens, threatening ecosystems far and wide, now extending their reach to impact human lives.

Fresh plea in Supreme Court to recall NEET results, reconduct examsA fresh petition has been filed in the Supreme Court to recall the National Entrance cum Eligibility Test - Under Graduate (NEET-UG) 2024 results and re-conduct fresh examination after discrepancies in the declared results.

NTA issues clarification after NEET result controversy over toppers, high cut-offIn a detailed statement, the National Testing Agency (NTA) said that the increase in cut-off and number of toppers in the NEET-UG reflect the competitive nature of the exam and maintained that the test's integrity has not been compromised.

Exclusive: Arvind Kejriwal claims 'BJP succession war, PM backing Amit Shah'Speaking exclusively to India Today TV, Delhi Chief Minister Arvind Kejriwal claimed that there is a "succession war" within the BJP. He also claimed that the ruling party is "not fighting the Lok Sabha elections as a team".

4 medical students arrested in Bihar for appearing as proxies for NEET aspirantsFour MBBS students who appeared in place of NEET aspirants in the medical entrance exam were detained in Bihar's Purnea.

NEET-UG question paper not leaked, claims baseless: National Testing AgencyThe reports claiming question paper leak in the medical entrance exam NEET-UG are "completely baseless and without any ground", the National Testing Agency (NTA) has clarified.
The generation with answers: Tech-savvy Indian youth tackling global challengesIndia's tech-savvy youth rewriting the global narrative, one solution at a time.

Left sweeps JNU students' polls, Dhananjay is first Dalit presidentThe Left swept the Jawaharlal Nehru University Students' Union (JNUSU) polls, winning all four posts and trouncing the RSS-affiliated ABVP. The ABVP was leading at one point, but the Left eventually surged ahead and emerged victorious.
The power of knowledge: Education's influence on real estate market trendsIn a dynamic sector like real estate, investing in continuing education is not simply an option; it is a requirement.
